divs: Sighting Detailsi have been noticeing these bright lights out side my window at night so i got some binaclers thinking that it was the police or some thing but when i looked threw them i saw three bright lights doing summer salts non top of each othe i see so much it is hard to explain only a few of my close friends have seen it nobody else seems to care that these objects are doing things at night ever night this goes oni can seem to get any help from these sights so this is it for me i give up
